channel.title: Spooky village is recruiting.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Spooky village is recruiting." - Hop on over anytime! :)

item.title: Spooky village is recruiting.
item.content:encoded: Spooky is a NRF IRV, you can look at what we've got here, we need a few more villagers to reach size 30, and will probably be saving up for Epic Monument in a week or less. We should be getting more shiney upgrades as time goes on as well. :)
